scripts.demo:netlify: yarn demo && yarn build:jsdoc && mv demo/js-docs/@vectorly-io/ai-filters/$npm_package_version demo/background/docs
scripts.lib:push: echo "Building and Pushing version as $npm_package_version, $PACKAGE_VERSION" && DOCS=true webpack --env target=push --progress
scripts.push:prod:
aws s3 cp --recursive dist/ s3://cdn-dotlearn-io/ai-filters/v1/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version} --dryrun && cli-confirm "
Please check and confirm if the version is correct (y/n)" && aws s3 cp --recursive dist s3://cdn-dotlearn-io/ai-filters/v1/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version} --acl private
scripts.build:jsdoc: echo ${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version} && (cat docs/home-template.md | sed "s/{{version}}/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version}/g" > docs/home.md) && rm -rf demo/js-docs/ && jsdoc -c jsdoc.conf.json -d demo/js-docs/
scripts.push:latest: export npm_forced_version=latest DOCS=true && yarn lib && yarn push:prod && yarn build:jsdoc && yarn push:jsdoc && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths "/ai-filters/v1/latest/*"  "/ai-filters/docs/latest/*"
scripts.serve:cdn:branch: export npm_forced_version=dev/$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && yarn serve:cdn
scripts.push:jsdoc:
aws s3 cp --recursive demo/js-docs/@vectorly-io/ai-filters/$npm_package_version s3://cdn-dotlearn-io/ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version} --dryrun && cli-confirm "
Please check and confirm if the version is correct (y/n)" && aws s3 cp --recursive demo/js-docs/@vectorly-io/ai-filters/$npm_package_version s3://cdn-dotlearn-io/ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version} && aws s3api copy-object --copy-source cdn-dotlearn-io/ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version}/index.html --key ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version}/ --bucket cdn-dotlearn-io && echo "

 docs uploaded to https://cdn.vectorly.io/ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version}/"
scripts.push:jsdoc-ci:
aws s3 cp --recursive demo/js-docs/@vectorly-io/ai-filters/$npm_package_version s3://cdn-dotlearn-io/ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version} && aws s3api copy-object --copy-source cdn-dotlearn-io/ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version}/index.html --key ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version}/ --bucket cdn-dotlearn-io && echo "

 docs uploaded to https://cdn.vectorly.io/ai-filters/docs/${npm_forced_version:-$npm_package_version}/"
scripts.push:branch: export npm_forced_version=dev/$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && yarn push:prod
